Edge

  Edge[#Newbery90##1#] is a program that allows the displaying of graphs. XF uses this program as an additional feature to represent the widget structure as a tree. It is not possible to use the displayed widget tree interactively. If this feature is not used (wanted), edge is not needed.

  
Figure: The edge program
